name: Birthday Crab's Birthday Carbs
description:
You are a little crab. You live in a colourful little village with no suspicious undertones at all. It is your birthday, and the tradition is that you bring the other villagers a treat. But what would they like?

A little game for Emma's Birthday Jam.

Mostly a proof of concept for doing painted backgrounds. Some Bitsyfolk in-jokes, I'm afraid.

Huge thanks to:

  • AYo for Borksy
  • Sean for the Transparent Sprites hack
  • Freya for telling me exactly how to make the background transparent
